entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:15 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 9:30 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to snow after midnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
